161.13.text:

173.57.text:

209.44.text:

SO IT WAS THAT ON THE EVE

NEW TECHNOLOGIES
SUCH AS MACHINE GUNS,

392.16.text:

397.40.text:

401.20.text:

422.96.text:

425.12.text:

431.93.text:

447.21.text:

465.03.text:

ESPECIALLY IN THE
FIGURE OF ASLAN,

1304.27.text:
LEWIS DESCRIBED A LOVING
BUT STERN GOD WHO CAME

1307.77.text:
TO SAVE US FROM OUR
SINS AND NOT IN OUR SINS.

1313.75.text:
AS WE RAISED OUR CHILDREN,
MY WIFE OFTEN TOLD THEM,

1318.18.text:
"ASLAN IS NOT A TAME LION,"
AS A WAY TO EXPLAIN

1322.22.text:
THAT WE MUST COME TO
ETERNAL LIFE ON HIS TERMS,

1327.79.text:
WE MUST ACCEPT GOD'S WILL
FOR OUR LIVES EVEN WHEN WE

1334.30.text:
LISTEN TO THIS INTERCHANGE IN
"THE SILVER CHAIR,"

1337.04.text:
ONE OF THE NARNIA CHRONICLES:
"'ARE YOU THIRSTY?'

1349.75.text:
"'WILL YOU PROMISE NOT TO-
"'DO ANYTHING TO ME IF I DO?'

1370.60.text:
"IT DIDN'T SAY THIS AS
"IF IT WERE BOASTING,

1373.37.text:
"NOR AS IF IT WERE SORRY,
"NOR AS IF IT WERE ANGRY.

1382.35.text:
"'I SUPPOSE I MUST GO AND LOOK
"'FOR ANOTHER STREAM THEN.'

1386.95.text:
"'THERE IS NO OTHER STREAM,'
SAID THE LION."

1391.49.text:
AND THAT IS THE GOSPEL'S MESSAGE
TO YOUR GENERATION.

1397.33.text:
ONLY ONE CONTAINS THE
WATER OF ETERNAL LIFE.

1400.50.text:
WE FIND A SIMILAR METAPHOR
IN LEHI'S VISION OF

1405.77.text:
THERE IS ONLY ONE PATH THAT
LEADS TO THE TREE OF LIFE.

1411.48.text:
THE PATH IS OFTEN OBSCURED
BY MISTS OF DARKNESS,

1418.28.text:
WITHOUT A HAND ON THE IRON ROD,
SOME WANDER IN WHAT ARE

1422.32.text:
CALLED "STRANGE PATHS"-
AND OUR WORLD IS

1428.33.text:
ALL WHO FOLLOWED THOSE
PATHS WERE LOST.

1431.86.text:
WE MUST BE HUMBLE ENOUGH TO
FOLLOW HIS PATH AND NOT OUR OWN.

1438.34.text:
MY BROTHERS AND SISTERS,
THE ENEMY OF YOUR SOULS

1441.67.text:
WILL ENTICE YOU TO TAKE
THESE STRANGE PATHS,

1447.01.text:
TO DEVOTE YOUR PRECIOUS LIFE
NOT TO BUILDING GOD'S KINGDOM,

1453.15.text:
FROM SATAN'S POINT OF VIEW,
ANY CAUSE WILL DO IF IT DIVERTS

1457.52.text:
GOD'S CHILDREN FROM THE ONE
PATH THAT ALLOWS THEM TO HOLD

1461.96.text:
FAST TO THE IRON ROD AND THUS
RECEIVE ONGOING REVELATION.

1467.97.text:
THIS WORLD IS FULL OF
ALTERNATIVES THAT,

1471.40.text:
IF THEY BECOME ONE'S
PRIMARY FOCUS,

1474.21.text:
CAN CROWD GOD HIMSELF
OUT OF OUR LIVES-

1480.55.text:
FULFILLING A BUCKET LIST,
MAKING LOTS OF MONEY,

1484.25.text:
OR AN OBSESSION WITH
SPORTS OR SOCIAL CAUSES.

1487.15.text:
THERE ARE ENDLESS PATHS IN
OUR WORLD OTHER THAN THE ONE

1491.36.text: THAT LEADS TO THE TREE OF LIFE.

1497.70.text:
SAID IT WELL:
"IF YOU HAVE NOT CHOSEN

1500.83.text:
"THE KINGDOM OF GOD FIRST,
"IT WILL IN THE END

1506.10.text:
"MAKE NO DIFFERENCE WHAT
YOU HAVE CHOSEN INSTEAD."

1512.08.text:
SO, PLEASE REMEMBER,
THERE IS A STORY LINE TO

1520.89.text:
IT INVOLVES A TRUE KING WHO IS
HIDDEN FROM THE WORLD'S SIGHT

1524.19.text:
FOR A TIME WHILE HIS KINGDOM
IS RULED OVER BY A WICKED

1527.93.text:
PRETENDER TO THE THRONE,
A CRUEL DESPOT WHO

1531.23.text:
SEEKS TO RULE BY WAR,
BLOOD AND HORROR.

1536.50.text:
BUT THE TRUE KING HAS
TRUE FOLLOWERS,

1538.80.text:
HUMBLE SERVANTS WHO ARE ABLE
TO SEE THROUGH ALL THE LIES

1542.34.text:
AND DECEPTIONS OF THE ENEMY,
AND WHO SEEK TO BUILD

1549.01.text:
THEY SEEK TO PREPARE A PEOPLE
WHO WILL BE READY TO RECEIVE

1551.35.text:
HIM WHEN HE COMES IN GLORY
AND DEFEATS THE FALSE KING,

1555.15.text:
REWARDING THOSE WHO ARE
LOOKING FORWARD TO HIS COMING.

1560.93.text:
I HAVE SPOKEN TODAY ABOUT LEWIS
AND TOLKIEN AS EXAMPLES OF THOSE

1565.36.text:
WHO SAW THE ULTIMATE REALITY
BEHIND ALL THIS WORLD'S

1569.63.text:
CONFLICTS AND INEQUITIES,
ITS BURDENS AND SORROWS.

1575.04.text:
THEY KNEW, AS WE READ IN ETHER,
THAT "GOOD COMETH OF NONE

1591.49.text:
AS WE ENTER THE
CHRISTMAS SEASON,

1593.36.text:
WE CELEBRATE THE FIRST COMING
OF THE SAVIOR TO THIS WORLD.

1596.73.text:
IN ONE OF OUR CHERISHED
SACRAMENT HYMNS,

1598.66.text:
WE SING
"JESUS, ONCE OF HUMBLE BIRTH,"

1602.33.text:
REMEMBERING HOW THE
KING OF KINGS WAS BORN

1607.67.text:
IT IS RIGHT THAT WE CELEBRATE
THAT AND TEACH OUR CHILDREN

1610.51.text:
TO KNOW THE REAL REASON
WE CELEBRATE CHRISTMAS.

1614.18.text:
BUT THE SONG GOES ON:
"JESUS ONCE OF HUMBLE BIRTH,

1629.56.text:
"ONCE FORSAKEN, LEFT ALONE,
NOW EXALTED TO A THRONE."

1637.07.text:
AS YOU THINK OF THE CHRIST
CHILD THIS CHRISTMAS SEASON,

1641.24.text:
REMEMBER ALSO THE
SEQUEL TO THAT STORY:

1645.14.text: THE FUTURE RETURN OF THE KING.

1649.95.text:
AS YOU REFLECT ON THE
STABLE IN BETHLEHEM,

1652.95.text:
KEEP ALONGSIDE IT THIS GLORIOUS
VISION FROM THE SCRIPTURES:

1658.52.text:
"AND I SAW HEAVEN OPENED,
"AND BEHOLD A WHITE HORSE;

1662.96.text:
"AND HE THAT SAT UPON HIM WAS
"CALLED FAITHFUL AND TRUE...

1667.30.text:
"HIS EYES WERE AS
"A FLAME OF FIRE,

1674.17.text:
"AND HE HATH ON HIS VESTURE AND
"ON HIS THIGH A NAME WRITTEN,

1682.25.text:
"AND SO GREAT SHALL BE THE
"GLORY OF HIS PRESENCE THAT

1684.82.text:
"THE SUN SHALL HIDE HIS
"FACE IN SHAME,

1691.29.text:
"AND HIS VOICE SHALL BE HEARD:
"I HAVE TRODDEN THE

1703.40.text:
"AND NOW THE YEAR OF
"MY REDEEMED IS COME;

1706.64.text:
"AND THEY SHALL MENTION THE
"LOVING KINDNESS OF THEIR LORD,

1709.47.text:
"AND ALL THAT HE HAS
"BESTOWED UPON THEM

1717.75.text:
IF WE ARE PREPARED
FOR HIS COMING-

1720.15.text:
IF WE ARE LOOKING FOR IT-
THAT DAY WILL BE A GREAT TIME

1727.56.text:
MAKE YOUR CHOICE,
BROTHERS AND SISTERS,

1731.56.text:
TO USE YOUR TIME IN THE
CAUSE THAT MATTERS MOST,

1734.47.text:
THE ONE THAT LEADS TO
THE MILLENNIAL REIGN

1741.94.text:
I BEAR MY TESTIMONY TO
YOU THAT HE IS THE TRUE

1749.15.text:
JESUS FIRST CAME AS
THE CHRIST CHILD,

1752.28.text:
A MEEK AND LOWLY LAMB,
WHO OFFERED HIMSELF

1758.32.text:
HE IS GOING TO
RETURN IN GLORY,

1760.29.text:
TO RECEIVE THE ACKNOWLEDGMENT
OF EVERY TONGUE,

1764.13.text: AND THE HOMAGE OF EVERY KNEE.

1767.77.text:
MAY WE PREPARE FOR THE RETURN
OF OUR KING IS MY PRAYER,

1772.47.text:
IN THE NAME OF JESUS CHRIST,
AMEN.

1780.75.text: ELDER LARRY Y. WILSON WAS GIVEN ON DECEMBER 1, 2015.
